title: OXO Corners & Edges Brush
description: Conquer your home's nooks and crannies with the OXO Good Grips Corners & Edges Brush. The shape of the Brush is ideal for cleaning tight spots including the corners of the shower or bathtub, or the edges of windowsills. The handle has a soft, comfortable, non-slip grip to cushion hand while scrubbing.

asset.title: OXO Corners & Edges Brush
asset.description:
http://www.oxo.com/p-338-corners-edges-brush.aspx

Conquer your home's nooks and crannies with the OXO Good Grips Corners & Edges Brush. The shape of the Brush is ideal for cleaning tight spots including the corners of the shower or bathtub, or the edges of windowsills. The handle has a soft, comfortable, non-slip grip to cushion hand while scrubbing.
asset.author: OXO

transcripts: At OXO, we created a group of cleaning brushes that are designed fro various specific household  tasks so the end result is sparkling clean. The OXO corners and edges brush is great for use on tile, tubs, showers, fixtures, and more. The unique bristle shape is flared in the front to help reach deep into the corners. The corner bristles are touch and strong to easily scrub away mildew, grime, and soap scum. The soft comfortable non slip handle provides a secure grip even when wet. Here's a good tip. Try using this brush to clean off muddy sneakers and cleats after a wet soccer game.
